tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to the Python and Database scripting workshop.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable).

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: Install python-oracledb driver and test connection to the Autonomous Database

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Python-oracledb driver for Oracle Database: The New Wave of Scripting
tutorials.description: Use Python and the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Connection Pools
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb connection pools to connect to the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Fetching Data
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb connection pools to fetch data from the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Binding Data
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb to bind data from the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 7: PL/SQL
tutorials.description: Use PL/SQL procedures and functions to access data stored in Oracle databases

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Type Handlers
tutorials.description: Use type handlers to alter data fetched or sent to the Oracle database using the python-oracledb to ......

tutorials.title: Lab 9: LOBS
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb to manipulate LOBs in Oracle databases

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Rowfactory Functions
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb to enable queries to return objects other than tuples

tutorials.title: Lab 11: Subclassing Connections and Cursors
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb to use subclassing for hooking connection and cursor creation

tutorials.title: Lab 12: Thick Mode
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb thick-mode for accessing advanced Oracle database functionality

tutorials.title: Lab 13: Advanced Queueing
tutorials.description: Use advanced queueing APIs usable in python-oracledb thick mode allow messages to be passed between applications

tutorials.title: Lab 14: Scrollable Cursors
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb thick mode applications to move backwards as well as forwards in query results

tutorials.title: Lab 15: Simple Oracle Document Access (SODA)
tutorials.description: Use SODA to retrieve, insert and query documents from Oracle databases

tutorials.title: Lab 16: Terminate Oracle Autonomous Database
tutorials.description: Terminating an Oracle Autonomous Database permanently

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
